title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Any good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be Yesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.I understood If there is no pmp but dont have Even the dmps what's going on ? Traders going mad now depresion is here.How long we have to wait ? Feels like we going insane crypto Market should function normally always when price High then it will fall immediately down so when we short we get Nice profit.The question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMRight now many signals don't work how they use to be Since when did those signals work the way they used to?  Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMYesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.They gave you the wrong signal and maybe someone paid them to give you that wrong signal (probably they earn more from you than those signals) So what will be your position now? Will you continue to trust these *signals*?Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMI understood If there is no pmp but dont have Even the dmps what's going on ? Because the market lacks liquidity now, there is no free money being pumped into the market, just as it happened two years ago.Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMHow long we have to wait ? Feels like we going insane crypto Market should function normally always when price High then it will fall immediately down so when we short we get Nice profit.For shiba and those scam signals, you will wait for a long time.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMAny good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be Yesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.Learn trading yourself. Signals can only indicate and the indication can be wrong. In trading, you need better strategies along which is what will make you a successful trader. Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.How is it going to work when you learn nothing about trading than signals. I hope you do not pay for the signals because it is just a way to scam you people.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: You create a crap ton of threads concerning economics, trading, and stuff and you're here being all amateurish and asking about why signals don't work. News flash — they never did. 99% are pump and dumps, while the rest only get a few trades here and there right.

comments.author: autumnleaf
comments.body: Never in my cryptocurrency career have I used crypto signals. I learn from my failures while studying trading, which helps me develop stronger methods for each subsequent move. In trading, I'm learning and signals cost you money.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.Crypto exist properly without trading signals so the answer is yes. Real crypto enthusiast will gonna stay despite this bullshit is not working. Also trading signal exist because a user like you believes on it that it is working while it’s not in reality.Trading signal is just gimmick by some traders with knowledge on technical analysis to fool those user that doesn’t have knowledge on TA so that they will blindly follow all the signals they are posting for there own benefits.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: autumnleaf on January 02, 2023, 01:06:13 PMNever in my cryptocurrency career have I used crypto signals. I learn from my failures while studying trading, which helps me develop stronger methods for each subsequent move. In trading, I'm learning and signals cost you money.People instead of doing hardwork or learning, completely rely upon signals. Only a signal by a big whale makes the market movie in that way. Leaving this no other signals whether those are paid or free never works. I would suggest that rather wasting money on signals, you should spend those to learn trading and it’s terms. At last if you are unable to do it, then go for free calls from twitter. Just follow 5-6 crypto veterans at Twitter, and when they talk about a specific coin just go for it. This works 70% of the time.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMAny good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be Signals might look like they are legit in that instance but long term might not be as good as you have said because they are as good as the provider themselves, btw around this time volume is low and would advice to stay away till markets are in full swing. Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMYesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.I understood If there is no pmp but dont have Even the dmps what's going on ? Traders going mad now depresion is here.No need to be depressed, as a matter of fact Entry time frames also play a role, if signal provider was entering on the 4hour and you are looking at the 5minute chart then market reactions will be totally different... And just to give yourself some peace of mind try to trade on your own terms and not relying on other people's signals. Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.Believe it or not when markets are bullish or not someone out there is  making money off them which says it all that crypto is here to stay.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMAny good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be Yesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.I am surprised the signal has been working for you before now and suddenly it stopped working. It means it could start working again because even traders strategies are struggling to function properly in this present market conditions.But how do you feel knowing that your profits and failure comes from what other persons gave you.Why not try and study the chart yourself and compare with they give you.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: There's never been any legit signal out there including the paid one. How you can't use your logic against this matter? if there's a legit signal where the prediction is mostly correct and have at least 70-80% correct percentage, why the person who create this signal doesn't use it for his trading? do you think he's very humble to give his own prediction to everyone and they will make money through his analysis? nope.No one want to reveal his way to earn money, especially the easy work and get huge salary.

comments.author: Raflesia
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.Why expect something from others.From the beginning I have tried trading until now I have switched and focused on long-term investments. I have never done something like that expecting signals from other people, especially sometimes things like that are usually paid and I don't really like that.What if the signal doesn't work? still i'd be in this scope as it works or not i don't feel burdened with them more precisely maybe don't really care about stuff like that.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMAny good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be Yesrterday shiba signal long was given out from the trading signals channels still not moving.I understood If there is no pmp but dont have Even the dmps what's going on ? Traders going mad now depresion is here.How long we have to wait ? Feels like we going insane crypto Market should function normally always when price High then it will fall immediately down so when we short we get Nice profit.The question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.Do you always expect a signal so you complain like this? It's a shame if you really do that. Friends, try to find your own potential regarding analysis in trading, because if you continue to expect signals like this, then people will lose in the future because many have missed opportunities to learn to analyze and create strategies that will work for you.How can you say that maybe crypto won't work, while you are not doing what is best for yourself?My advice, don't look too much for signals to trade, try to learn by yourself, then I'm sure you can see a big opportunity in a situation like this.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMHow long we have to wait ? Feels like we going insane crypto Market should function normally always when price High then it will fall immediately down so when we short we get Nice profit.The question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.There's no such thing to work in the first place since these signals arent 100% precise for you to follow and make profits and this kind of opposite outcome does proves out that its not really that ideal on following such signals because it doesnt really give out that kind of precision and there's no trader or human on this world could able to know on what are the things that would happen ahead.This is why it is really that much better if you do trade on your own with your own analysis and predictions rather than making yourself that too relying into those so called signal givers.It isnt really just worth for those sub fees imho.

comments.author: lixer
comments.body: Quote from: milewilda on January 02, 2023, 07:11:34 PMThere's no such thing to work in the first place since these signals arent 100% precise for you to follow and make profits and this kind of opposite outcome does proves out that its not really that ideal on following such signals because it doesnt really give out that kind of precision and there's no trader or human on this world could able to know on what are the things that would happen ahead.This is why it is really that much better if you do trade on your own with your own analysis and predictions rather than making yourself that too relying into those so called signal givers.It isnt really just worth for those sub fees imho.If nothing works here then people shouldn't be trading now but why did trading grow like this? It means there is money to be made in this market but it requires a lot of trial and error to be able to master how things work. There is no such thing as 100 percent but there is an over 90 percent working signal or strategy. It's either it came on our own or we availed it from someone else.This is the only downside here. Sometimes it needs money to make money. You are right that it's still better to work on our own so that we can be able to save more money in the process. It also gives us a confidence. Not if we are only relying on someone else because what if they close their service soon?

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: the only reason these signals work is because they are giving out signal in bull market where quite literally every coin is bullish, in current trend instead it didn't work because i'm sure no one in this world have any idea how the market gonna moves, otherwise they'd generate millions by now, even if these signal are so good and based from real analysis, there is always inaccuracy.otherwise I think if you're still relying so much in these signal, just wait until there's bullruns, because current trend requires analysis from yourself that most of the time requires you long term planning.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.People like you will ask the questions you are asking now because all your trading activities are only based on other people, but mature traders understand what they will do every time the market experiences things that are not according to their analysis, so the answer is in yourself whether to stay focused on the signals or improve your trading knowledge and do your own analysis regardless of the signal from anywhere

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Signals are coded by people and they must be updated to be suitable with each market phase. If people don't upgrade code, signals are outdated because signals in bear market are different than in bull market.One strategy, one signal can not work accurately for both bear and bull markets as well as different phases of a market.In bear market, cryptocurrency is more sensitive with news, fud so signals will not work accurately like in bull market or in accumulation phase with less fud.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMThe question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ? Unlikely we stay.This is a question that has already found an answer for itself. You won't stay if you are not making profit from it so you are speaking for yourself or for some groups who are considering quitting or who have quit because they are not finding profit in it. Remember trading is not 100% profitting but if you can make profit higher than the usual job you do then you are profitting and if you are not able to then learning or quitting is the choice to make.

comments.author: Psynthax
comments.body: signals are always such a bullshit, most of the time, when their signal is right they are just stating the obvious, now these signals are showing its true colour that is they never correct from very beginning, these signals maker just don't have any idea about the future prices, they are just random guessing and if one of them is right they'd call themselves genius.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on January 02, 2023, 11:51:35 AMAny good signals ? Right now many signals don't work how they use to be What did you expect then?There's no good in any signal groups because most of them turn to scam or scams their users by giving a false trading signal. Don't work because they are not a good source for your trading, it should you must learn on your own. QuoteI understood If there is no pmp but dont have Even the dmps what's going on ?That's just the market how works, because of the volatility nature of the price eventually pump and dumps, it could be we've experienced a dump market today because who knows days have passed there will be another new ATH will come on Bitcoin price. QuoteHow long we have to wait ?The question is Will we stay in crypto If it's not working ?There's no specific time but it's proven for how many years based on history that Bitcoin price will always reach another all-time high.If you've faith and trust, you can wait and those who have patient will receive a better reward in the future.
